abstract: Exxon said it would spend much of the record $39.5 billion it earned last year by increasing investment in oil and natural gas projects.
snippet: Exxon said it would spend much of the record $39.5 billion it earned last year by increasing investment in oil and natural gas projects.
lead_paragraph: Exxon Mobil, the world’s biggest publicly traded oil company, which earned a record $39.5 billion last year, explained yesterday how it was going to spend all that cash.

headline.main: Exxon Plans to Lift Output a Million Barrels a Day
headline.print_headline: Exxon Plans to Lift Output A Million Barrels a Day
